      • Order

        public boolean isDelivery()
        Returns whether the order is to be delivered or not.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean. True if the order is to be delivered, else False.

                   int quantity)
        Remove a number of items from an order.
        Parameters:

        quantity - The number of items to remove.

      • set

        public void set(MenuItem item,
                int quantity)
        Set/change the number of MenuItems in an order.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem object of which you want to change the number of.
        quantity - The number of MenuItem objects the order is to have.
